attributes.action: get mps to tell the truth about themselves
attributes.additional_details:
All MPs should be forced to tell the public the truth and that is they are not here for your benefit but just to become very rich people and make your life a misery via laws that hinder your life as in reality we are only interested in the rich elites and those capable of enriching us financially..
We are not here for the normal people who we steal from..
so i think you should all be told the truth from them.
lets see this one debated in the hole they call parliament. I would pay...
